messages.title: At the General Election What will YOU do?
messages.content: The Conservatives have been desperately trying to force Brexit through, but purely in the interests of the Conservative party. They have been frighteningly ready to engineer a 'No Deal' departure from the EU, whatever it costs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Properly fund the NHS and schools.
Tackle the housing shortage, and help local authorities and housing associations with finance to build more social housing.
Ensure that rural communities are sustainable, with continued access to vital services like Post Offices.
Encourage technological innovation, and prioritise fast broadband for all - including rural areas.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit – subject to a people's vote.
issues.education: Properly fund the NHS and schools.
issues.environment: Save the planet from the effects of climate change.

community.content: Scrutiny of planning applications to prevent conditions imposed on developers. Tackling pollution issues.

leaflet.personalStatement: Having been a teacher and headmaster, Robert Court brings experience from outside politics. He has worked tirelessly in education with truth and integrity. As a Green Liberal Democrat, he feels strongly that tackling the climate emergency is urgent and absolutely vital. Robert is willing to stand up for his values and his community time and time again. If you want to bring about change in Derbyshire Dales, voting Liberal Democrat is the only way to do it.

quotes.text: The Conservatives have been frighteningly ready to engineer a 'No Deal' departure from the EU, whatever it costs.

examples: Frighteningly ready to engineer a 'No Deal' departure.
Save the planet from the effects of climate change.
Work tirelessly in education with truth and integrity.
If it is, vote for them; if it isn’t, don’t.
Scrutiny of planning applications to prevent conditions imposed on developers
Save the planet from the effects of climate change.
Properly fund the NHS and schools.
Subject Brexit to a people's vote.
